QuestData.Title: The Warden's Game
QuestData.Description: You see the statue split into two, then four, then eight identical statues in a square formation.$b$bYou hear a voice, not through your ears, but in the back of your mind:$b$b "A true warden does not face OUTWARD, searching for signs of danger.$b A true warden keeps his gaze INWARD, always focused on protecting his quarry."$b$bPerhaps this is a riddle of some sort?
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Warden's Game by teleporting the Warden's Pawns into inward-facing positions.
QuestData.RewardText: The jade statue becomes one again, and you place it in your pocket. You hear a shifting noise in the tomb's central chamber.
